response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $13,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value, allowing you to enjoy the benefits of the product while saving $2,000 compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 13000}
